publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4804 Richard Lochhead: Duffus Wins Britain in Bloom Award—That the Parliament congratulates Duffus in Moray for winning the award for best small village at the Britain in Bloom Awards 2006; commends the residents of Duffus for the hard work and dedication required to achieve this highly prestigious award, and recognises that the award is a great asset to the village and will provide a boost to tourism and the area’s image.
S2M-4804 Duffus Wins Britain in Bloom Award (lodged on 15 September 2006) Eleanor Scott*, John Swinburne*, Jim Mather*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4804 Duffus Wins Britain in Bloom Award (lodged on 15 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Fergus Ewing*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-4804 Duffus Wins Britain in Bloom Award (lodged on 15 September 2006) Shiona Baird*
S2M-4804 Duffus Wins Britain in Bloom Award (lodged on 15 September 2006) Robin Harper*, Dave Petrie*
S2M-4804 Duffus Wins Britain in Bloom Award (lodged on 15 September 2006) Alex Johnstone*
